room_title: Escape room "Ghosts of the Black Hills" by Black Hills Escape Rooms in Rapid City
review: We had an awesome experience. We did the Ghost room and it was fantastic! It was unbelievable how helpful and friendly the staff was. We can't wait to go back and try the other rooms. Thank you again for such a fun and great experience!

room_title: Escape room "Ghosts of the Black Hills" by Black Hills Escape Rooms in Rapid City
review: Had my daughter's 14th birthday party here yesterday. All the kids loved it. The staff was very polite and helpful to the kids. He also let us have fun scaring the kids as they did the 'Ghost of the Black Hills". We highly recommend it and will be going back.
